title: runtime/cgo: _check_for_64_bit_pointer_matching_GoInt declared as an array with a negative size
body:
`iostest.bash` fails for me right now with:

```
# runtime/cgo
In file included from $WORK/runtime/cgo/_obj/_cgo_export.c:2:
/var/folders/jw/xrvq7wz95p5bwvjyx9yc2npm390cfb/T/go-build406231563/runtime/cgo/_obj/_cgo_export.h:23:55: error: '_check_for_64_bit_pointer_matching_GoInt' declared as an array with a negative size
```

Go repo at 21ed40c8cb4795433bda0cfb7754db5603a916f0. clang version `Apple LLVM version 6.0 (clang-600.0.57) (based on LLVM 3.5svn), Target: x86_64-apple-darwin14.1.0`. Using a regular, locked iPhone 6.

Full build log:

```bash

Restarting device.

	</dict>
</dict>
```
